      • filterMsSpectra

        public static List<MsSpectrum> filterMsSpectra(List<MsSpectrum> spectra,
                                               int listLimit)
        Method preprocesses list of spectra, limits its amount Filtering of Spectrum objects is done by retrieving top N Spectrum objects with largest intensity values
        Parameters:
        spectra - - list of spectrum to be preprocessed
        listLimit - - maximum amount of items to be in a new list
        Returns:
        filtered lists
